basics.name: Eduardo Esqueda
basics.label: Software Developer specialized in Full-Stack development, AI/ML and innovative enterprise solutions

summary.paragraph: Full-Stack Developer specialized in integrating artificial intelligence into enterprise solutions. With over 4 years of experience developing web applications, mobile applications, and enterprise systems, I focus on creating technologies that automate business processes and improve operational efficiency.

My technical experience includes developing multiplatform ERP systems, mobile applications that incorporate Artificial Intelligence or LLMs, implementing chatbots with LLM and RAG techniques on websites, real-time object detection systems with computer vision, and scalable cloud architectures. I have worked in both startups and industrial environments, always seeking innovative solutions that generate real impact.

My biggest dream is to contribute and leave a mark in artificial intelligence. I currently have a thesis on my research about ERP systems powered by LLM-based chatbots for business process automation. I seek opportunities as a Full-Stack developer or specialist in AI applications where I can apply my experience in emerging technologies and contribute to the growth of innovative teams.

work.name: MJ Studio
work.summary: Development of multiplatform ERP system using Flutter, Firebase and AI. Developed APIs and backend services with Express and TypeScript. Created websites with Next.js/Astro.js with an LLM-based chatbot using OpenAI API to automate business processes; developed multi-branch POS systems and implemented chatbots with RAG techniques to intelligently resolve user queries.

work.name: Valeo
work.summary: Backend development with .NET (ASP.NET MVC) and Azure for the manufacturing industry. Implemented real-time process tracking systems, inventory management and object detection solutions using Python, OpenCV and YOLOv11. Also developed Visual Basic applications integrated with Python middleware to interface with USB-1024LS DAQ devices.
highlights: Development and deployment of complex systems

work.name: APIA Ingenieria
work.summary: Implemented expense management systems using Node.js and Express.js. Designed secure authentication flows with Bearer tokens, used Lambda functions for serverless tasks and developed user interfaces with Flutter. Maintained SQL databases ensuring integrity and optimal performance.

work.name: Amm.co
work.position: Developer, Technical Support, and Customer Service
work.summary: Developed and automated an inventory management system using React.js and Express.js, while also providing technical support and customer service.

education.area: Software Engineering - Thesis: Development of ERP that incorporates LLM agents to improve decision making and automation

projects.name: Daniel GPT - AI Portfolio Chatbot
projects.description: Advanced AI-powered chatbot integrated into my portfolio website, built with RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) architecture. Features document consultation capabilities, function execution for scheduling interviews, and seamless integration with AWS services. Frontend built with modern tech stack: Astro.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, i18n support, and responsive design. Demonstrates cutting-edge AI implementation, cloud architecture skills, and modern frontend development practices.

projects.name: 00lar Solutions
projects.description: Business website where I present my development solutions and offer services to companies to create web pages and mobile applications. The platform also showcases my developed products like English Gym, serving as a commercial portfolio and point of contact for potential clients.

projects.name: Connection GPT
projects.description: Mobile application that uses AI-generated responses to help users reply to text messages efficiently and contextually. Developed with a focus on intuitive UX and rapid AI integration.

projects.name: English Gym
projects.description: AI-powered language learning application that dynamically generates personalized English exercises, adapting to the user's level and goals. Features a modern and attractive interface for a motivating learning experience.
